title: Oriental BBQ pork fillet
ingredients: ['Brine', '4 tablespoons sea salt', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '725ml warm water', '2 (335g) pork fillets', 'Marinade', '130g crunchy peanut butter', '4 tablespoons sake', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons groundnut oil', '2 tablespoons Thai chilli paste', '2 tablespoons Sriracha chilli sauce', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh root ginger', '4 tablespoons finely chopped spring onions', '4 tablespoons finely chopped fresh coriander']
